Name: Angels' Advocate
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (cut to be used to form a cross).
EXPRESS orange zest over cocktail and then use as a garnish to form a cross shape on the cocktail.
Review: Advocaat, gin, and lemon juice harmoniously combine in this pale yellow cocktail. Vanilla syrup adds balance, and cardamom enlivens the blend.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Tess Posthumus in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Angels' Advocate contains 167 calories
